title: Design AKS Network Architecture
description: Define VNet topology, subnets, Azure CNI networking strategy, and Network Security Groups (NSGs) for Zero Trust compliance.
acceptance_criteria: Network topology diagram approved; IP ranges calculated

title: Develop Terraform Module for AKS Cluster
description: Write Terraform HCL to provision the managed Kubernetes cluster resource, enabling Azure AD RBAC and monitoring.
acceptance_criteria: Terraform apply successful; RBAC enabled

title: Configure AKS Node Pools
description: Define Terraform resources for System and User node pools with autoscaling rules enabled.
acceptance_criteria: System and User pools isolated; Autoscaling verified

title: Configure Passport-JWT Strategy for Azure AD B2C
description: Implement the Passport strategy to validate JWT signature, issuer, and audience against Azure AD B2C metadata.
acceptance_criteria: Valid B2C tokens accepted; Invalid tokens rejected

title: Implement Role Guard and Decorator
description: Create the @Roles() decorator and the RolesGuard to check user roles against required endpoint roles.
acceptance_criteria: Decorators enforce role constraints on controllers

title: Design and Implement Local Database Schema
description: Setup WatermelonDB or Realm with schema for storing queued requests and local data cache.
acceptance_criteria: Local DB initializes; Schema migration successful

title: Integrate Mapbox GL JS
description: Setup Mapbox map component, handle API key security, and basic map rendering.
acceptance_criteria: Map renders; Controls functional; API key secured

title: Setup WebSocket Gateway with Redis Adapter
description: Initialize Gateway, configure Redis IoAdapter for horizontal scaling, and implement connection handling.
acceptance_criteria: Gateway accepts connections; Messages propagate via Redis

title: Implement WebSocket Authentication Handshake
description: Secure the WebSocket connection by validating JWTs during the handshake phase, using the existing Auth module.
acceptance_criteria: Secure handshake validates JWT before connection

title: Implement Network Status Monitor & Queue Logic
description: Create a hook to monitor connectivity and a service to add/remove items from the offline queue.
acceptance_criteria: Offline state detected; Requests persist to local DB

title: Implement Polygon Drawing Controls
description: Add Mapbox Draw plugin, configure for polygon mode only, and manage drawing state.
acceptance_criteria: User can draw/edit polygons; State managed in React

title: Implement GeoJSON Validation and Export
description: Validate drawn shapes (closed loops, no self-intersections) and export as GeoJSON for API submission.
acceptance_criteria: Self-intersections detected; Valid GeoJSON output

title: Perform Infrastructure Security Scan & Validation
description: Run tfsec or checkov against the codebase, fix violations, and execute a deployment to the Dev environment.
acceptance_criteria: Security scan passed; Dev environment operational

title: Implement Location Broadcast Logic
description: Develop logic to handle 'location_update' events, validate payload, and broadcast to the specific room for the Service Request.
acceptance_criteria: Technician/User room join works; Location propagates

title: Develop Sync Processor with Retry Logic
description: Build the background process that iterates through the queue when online, attempts to send requests, and handles failures.
acceptance_criteria: Queue processes FIFO; Retry backoff functional

title: Implement Camera Capture Component
description: Create a reusable camera component handling permissions, capture, and basic image manipulation.
acceptance_criteria: Photo capture works; Permissions handled

title: Integrate Azure Blob Upload and OCR API
description: Upload captured image to Azure Storage, trigger OCR API, and map response to form state.
acceptance_criteria: Image uploaded; OCR data mapped to fields

title: Ensure Accessibility for Map Tools
description: Implement keyboard navigation or alternative input methods for map drawing to meet WCAG 2.1 AA.
acceptance_criteria: Keyboard accessible; Screen reader compatible

title: Perform Load Testing on WebSocket Gateway
description: Simulate high concurrency of connections and message throughput to verify scaling and latency requirements.
acceptance_criteria: 1000 concurrent connections stable; <200ms latency

title: Develop Unit and Integration Tests for Auth Module
description: Write comprehensive tests covering token validation, role checking, and failure scenarios.
acceptance_criteria: >90% coverage; Edge cases covered
